tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ErrorCorrectionMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    error_id INT,
    strategy_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (error_id) REFERENCES Errors(error_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES CorrectionStrategies(strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Error_Corrections (
  correction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  error_id INT NOT NULL,
  strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (error_id) REFERENCES Errors(error_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES Correction_Strategies(strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Circuit_Errors (
  circuit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  error_id INT NOT NULL,
  circuit_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  circuit_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (error_id) REFERENCES Errors(error_id)
);

CREATE TABLE QuantumCircuits (
    circuit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    error_id INT,
    strategy_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (error_id) REFERENCES ErrorTypes(error_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES CorrectionStrategies(strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CircuitErrors (
    circuit_error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    circuit_id INT,
    error_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (circuit_id) REFERENCES QuantumCircuits(circuit_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (error_id) REFERENCES ErrorTypes(error_id)
);
